channel.title: CVE Feed for the libreswan Project -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for the libreswan Project -- all products

item.title: CVE-2020-1763|2024-08-04T06:46:30.902Z -- the%20libreswan%20project -- libreswan
item.description: An out-of-bounds buffer read flaw was found in the pluto daemon of libreswan from versions 3.27 till 3.31 where, an unauthenticated attacker could use this flaw to crash libreswan by sending specially-crafted IKEv1 Informational Exchange packets. The daemon respawns after the crash.

item.title: CVE-2019-10155|2024-08-04T22:10:09.974Z -- the%20libreswan%20project -- libreswan
item.description: The Libreswan Project has found a vulnerability in the processing of IKEv1 informational exchange packets which are encrypted and integrity protected using the established IKE SA encryption and integrity keys, but as a receiver, the integrity check value was not verified. This issue affects versions before 3.29.
